name: Handgun Hurling
description:
It's a simple concept, shoot the targets. However it's executed in a not-so-simple manner. Throw Handguns down the range, when they hit something they'll discharge and shoot anything in the path of barrel.

Created for Weekly Game Jam #164, under the theme "Hurl."

Controls:

Click, drag, and release anywhere on the screen to throw a handgun. The angle and length of your drag determines the direction and power of the throw.

Scroll the mouse wheel (or press z and x) while dragging to apply torque on the throw.

Press r to restart a level.
Press escape to open up the pause menu.
